name: Create a dropshipping store
description: Dropshipping is an e-commerce technique. The core idea is to create an online shop which basically relays any purchases made through it to other online retailers which then send the product directly to the customer. The dropshipping store owner collects a commission. Its main advantage is that it's not necessary to have a permanent storage of the goods to be sold. The main disadvantage is that you as the store owner have to take liability for deliveries and products from the third-party shops you relay the orders to. This can, theoretically, result in massive financial drawbacks.

name: Buy an accumulating, globally diversified ETF
description: ETFs, Exchange Traded Funds are an asset class that was invented in the 1970s. The main idea is to setup a fund that replicates a given index like the S&P 500 or the DAX and participate in the overall development of this index instead of betting on single stocks. Furthermore, due to mimicking an index, an ETF is usually passive, which means that there is no fund manager who actively manages the funds composition. This significantly reduces the cost associated with purchasing and holding the fund over time. Usually, ETF investors also utilize a passive investment strategy, e.g. they buy and hold their assets for longer periods of time (think years up to multiple decades).

name: Trade Commodities
description: Commodities like crude oil, gold, or other precious metals can also be traded on stock exchanges.

name: Trade FOREX
description: FOREX, 'Foreign Exchange' trading refers to trading of certain fiat currency pairs. Common pairs include EURO/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY. Generally speaking, this is a more advanced type of trying to earn money on the financial markets. However, due to its well-defined assets (currencies backed by states), it offers certain characteristics that may allow exploitation, especially for algorithmic trading.

name: Buy dividend stocks
description: Generally speaking, there are two major reasons why people or organizations buy stocks. The first is growth (e.g. they hope the market value of the stock will rise), the second is dividends. A dividend is a cash payment made by the company to its shareholders, proportionally to their relative share in the company.

name: Buy a dividend-yielding globally diversified ETF
description: This strategy points to buying and holding an ETF

name: Utilize a robo-advisor to setup an ETF-based portfolio
description: Generally speaking, there are two major reasons why people or organizations buy stocks. The first is growth (e.g. they hope the market value of the stock will rise), the second is dividends.

name: Get into remote, freelancing or self-employed work, then move to a country / location with significantly lower cost of living ('also known under the term of geo-arbitrage')
description: The core idea of this strategy is that in today's digital economy, it is possible to do full-remote work, therefore rendering the exact location where people work from irrelevant. Accordingly, it is possible to move to a country or area with lower cost of living (and possibly taxes), to save money in the long run. Technically, this is both possible for salaried an self-employed work. However, the increased flexibility of self-employed or entrepreneurial work types may come in handy. The main drawback is the massive lifestyle change required.

name: AirBnB Hosting
description: It is possible to rent out a flat and host it on AirBnb even if you do not own any property. However, certain laws and regulations apply, so it is required to check beforehand whether it is actually possible to do so. Additionally, you are essentially conducting a leveraged business model and have to carry certain liabilities, which may cause problems should you have AirBnB renters who damaage or destroy property.

name: Consulting, Coaching and other types of freelance work
description: It is possible to rent out a flat and host it on AirBnb even if you do not own any property. However, certain laws and regulations apply, so it is required to check beforehand whether it is actually possible to do so. Additionally, you are essentially conducting a leveraged business model and have to carry certain liabilities, which may cause problems should you have AirBnB renters who damaage or destroy property.

name: Consulting, Coaching and other types of freelancing work
description: Depending on your job and previous experience you may have some specific skills other people may be willing to buy as a service from you. This can include a wide range of topics, including but not limited to marketing, IT / Software, content authoring, proofreading, nutrition, sports.
major_cons: specific knowledge and marketing / sales talent required

name: Create an online course to sell on platforms like Udemy.com
description: Due to platforms like udemy, anyone can create a digital course
major_pros: Level of commitment is relatively low
major_cons: You actually need specific skills on the topic to make a reasonable course
The topic needs to be in demand, or can fall out of it over time

major_cons: You actually need specific skills on the topic to make a reasonable course
